CORRECT_ANSWER_EASY.text: Fine, whatever. That was an easy one anyway.

CORRECT_ANSWER_HARD.text: Impressive. But your luck will run out.
You may have won the battle, but the war is far from over.

INCORRECT_ANSWER_EASY.text: Pathetic! You call that an attempt?
Even a goblin could answer that.

INCORRECT_ANSWER_HARD.text: And so, your confidence crumbles to dust. As expected.
Perhaps this is too much for your feeble mind.

GAME_OVER.text: Game over. Your soul is mine.

SESSION_WIN.text: You've survived... for now. Don't think this is over.
